name: Escape Block King
description:
You will need to move the red block to the exit.
Horizontal bar can be moved from side to side
Vertical bar can be moved up and down

[Features]
- Multiplayer mode: Brain match with the world player of online
- Singleplayer: 4 difficulty level: easy to difficult
- You can get a hint if Winning at Online match
- Every day get a hint.
- Supports your ranking, accomplishment, and multiplay
- Support all tablet devices
- fun game, free game, no wifi, no internet
